snippet.title: Wild Bastards - Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games
snippet.description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009549

The spiritual successor to the epic strategy-shooter Void Bastards, Wild Bastards is a hybrid FPS/strategy game with heart-pounding tactical combat, detailed management systems, and a roguelike campaign. Saddle up and lead the most notorious outlaws in the galaxy. Wishlist now on PlayStation!

#ps5 #ps5games
